definition: Ryder Cup (US and Europe golf team competition)
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: Europe is looking to recapture the Ryder Cup after falling to the US in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲隊期望在2008年輸給美國後重新奪回萊德杯。

sentences.english: So I have a long way to go.
sentences.chinese: 去打萊德杯，我還有很長的一段路要走。

sentences.english: Nike Golf outfitted the triumphant U. S. Ryder Cup team.
sentences.chinese: 耐吉高球團隊爲冠軍隊伍美國萊德杯隊設計比賽球服。

sentences.english: Stricker and Mahan played the first time two years ago at Valhalla.
sentences.chinese: 史翠克和馬漢兩年前在瓦爾哈拉是第一次打萊德杯。

sentences.english: Q. Are you planning on playing in The Ryder Cup this year?
sentences.chinese: 你今年計劃去打萊德杯嗎？

sentences.english: Mahan has played on the last three American Ryder Cup teams, always as a captain's pick.
sentences.chinese: 馬漢一直憑藉着隊長的外卡打過三屆美國萊德杯。
